name: Gravitoids (MasterProject)
description:
[PLAY IN FULLSCREEN] GRAVITOIDS

Gravitoids is an asteroids-esque game that employs gravity as its core mechanic. In it, the player takes control of a small research ship with experimental features such as a spatial anchor, a shield module and a missile launcher, which all consume energy cells.

To help conserve resources, the ship also has a gravity-altering device, which does not drain energy. With it, ships and asteroids can be displaced and destroyed, ensuring the safety of the ship.

CONTROLS
  • WASD - Thrusters (Change velocity)
  • Left Mouse Button - Increase Asteroid Gravity
  • Right Mouse Button - Decrease Asteroid Gravity
  • Space - Launch Missile
  • Left Control - Spatial Anchor (Reset velocity)
  • Left Shift - Shield (Negate all damage for a moment)
  • R - Reset Game
  • Esc - Quit to Menu/Quit Game
